CustomField.description: Sum of MRR USD amounts from all related Assets - provides multi-currency Contract reporting in USD regardless of individual Asset currencies (Text format for proper $ display)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total MRR in USD calculated by summing all related Asset MRR USD amounts. Automatically updates when Asset MRR values change. Displays as $123,456.78 format.
CustomField.label: MRR (USD)
